title: Greg's Played Ghostwire Tokyo: Preview Impressions - Kinda Funny Games Daily 03.14.22
description:
Blessing and Tim are joined by Greg Miller for a full preview breakdown of Ghostwire: Tokyo. We also talk Stranger of Paradise: Final Fantasy Origins and a Hogwarts Legacy State of Play.

Time Stamps -
00:00:00 - Start
00:03:00 - Housekeeping
A new episode of Kinda Funny Xcast is available right now. It’s Gary, Parris, and Snowbike Mike talking about if Starfield can be the next best open world game. That’s up right now on Youtube.com/kindafunnyGames, and podcast services around the globe.
Thank you to our Patreon Producers: Gordon McGuire, FargoBrady, & Pranksy
The Roper Report  -
00:05:20 - Ghostwire Tokyo Preview Round up
00:27:35 - Ad
00:31:49 - Stranger Of Paradise: Final Fantasy Origin review round up
00:38:50 - We’re getting another State of Play, this time it’s focused on Hogwarts Legacy - PlayStation Blog
00:43:50 - Perfect Dark has lost its game director - Andy Robinson @ VGC
00:50:06 - Tiny Tina’s Wonderlands will have Full CrossPlay - Randy Pitchford on Twitter
00:52:41 - Out today
00:56:10 - You‘re Wrong
Tomorrow’s Hosts: Snowbike Mike and Gary
